languages.text: "Надзиратель средней палубы АЛ-84, Ваша Светлость! Мы собирали людей среди атакованных отсеков, когда угодили в ловушку. Почти все блюстители пали... это — те, кто остался жив после боев".

"Overseer of Middle Deck AL-84, my {mf|lord|lady}! We were rounding up everyone we could find in the attacked compartments when we ran into an ambush. Just about every enforcer fell... These are the survivors."
languages.original_text: "Надзиратель средней палубы АЛ-84, Ваша Светлость! Мы собирали людей среди атакованных отсеков, когда угодили в ловушку. Почти все блюстители пали... это — те, кто остался жив после боев".

traits.locale_text: "Overseer of Middle Deck AL-84, my {mf|lord|lady}! We were rounding up everyone we could find in the attacked compartments when we ran into an ambush. Just about every enforcer fell... These people are all who survived the battles."

"Overseer of Middle Deck AL-84, my {mf|lord|lady}! We were rounding up everyone we could find in the attacked compartments when we ran into an ambush. Just about every enforcer fell... These people are all who survived the battles."

"Overseer of Middle Deck AL-84, my {mf|lord|lady}! We were rounding up everyone we could find in the attacked compartments when we ran into an ambush. Just about every enforcer fell... These are the survivors."

"Overseer of Middle Deck AL-84, my {mf|lord|lady}! We were rounding up everyone we could find in the attacked compartments when we ran into an ambush. Just about every enforcer fell... These are the survivors."

"Overseer of Middle Deck AL-84, my {mf|lord|lady}! We were rounding up everyone we could find in the attacked compartments when we ran into an ambush. Just about every enforcer fell... These are the survivors."

languages.text: “我是中层甲板的AL-84号监察员，大人！飞船遭到袭击的时候，我们努力召集着甲板上的战斗人员，随后遭到了伏击。几乎所有执法者都被干掉了……这些是幸存下来的人。”
languages.original_text: "Overseer of Middle Deck AL-84, my {mf|lord|lady}! We were rounding up everyone we could find in the attacked compartments when we ran into an ambush. Just about every enforcer fell... These are the survivors."

traits.locale_text: “我是中层甲板的AL-84号监察员，大人！飞船遭到袭击的时候，我们努力召集着甲板上的战斗人员，随后遭到了伏击。几乎所有镇压者都被干掉了……这些是幸存下来的人。”

languages.text: «¡El supervisor de la cubierta intermedia AL-84, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Estábamos reuniendo a tanta gente como encontrábamos en los compartimentos atacados cuando caímos presa de una emboscada. Casi todos los guardias cayeron... Estos son los supervivientes».
languages.original_text: "Overseer of Middle Deck AL-84, my {mf|lord|lady}! We were rounding up everyone we could find in the attacked compartments when we ran into an ambush. Just about every enforcer fell... These are the survivors."

traits.locale_text: «¡El supervisor de la cubierta intermedia AL-84, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Estábamos reuniendo a tanta gente como encontrábamos en los compartimentos atacados cuando caímos presa de una emboscada. Casi todos los guardias cayeron... Estos son los supervivientes».

languages.text: 「中層デッキAL-84の監督官でございます、陛下！襲撃された区画で見つけられる限りの者を集めていたところ、待ち伏せに遭いました。ほぼすべてのエンフォーサーがやられました…生存者はこれだけです」
languages.original_text: "Overseer of Middle Deck AL-84, my {mf|lord|lady}! We were rounding up everyone we could find in the attacked compartments when we ran into an ambush. Just about every enforcer fell... These are the survivors."

traits.locale_text: 「中デッキAL-84の監督官、{mf|陛下|陛下}！攻撃されたコンパートメントで見つかった者全員を集めていた時、待ち伏せ攻撃に遭いました。ほぼすべての執行者がやられました…生存者はこれだけです」
「中層デッキAL-84の監督官でございます、陛下！襲撃された区画で見つけられる限りの者を集めていたところ、待ち伏せに遭いました。ほぼすべてのエンフォーサーがやられました…生存者はこれだけです」

languages.text: « Je suis le superviseur du pont intermédiaire AL-84, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame} ! Nous étions en train de rassembler toutes les personnes présentes dans les compartiments attaqués lorsque nous sommes tombés dans une embuscade. Presque tous les prévôts ont trouvé la mort... Vous avez devant vous les quelques survivants. »
languages.original_text: "Overseer of Middle Deck AL-84, my {mf|lord|lady}! We were rounding up everyone we could find in the attacked compartments when we ran into an ambush. Just about every enforcer fell... These are the survivors."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis le superviseur du pont intermédiaire AL-84, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame} ! Nous étions en train de rassembler toutes les personnes présentes dans les compartiments attaqués lorsque nous sommes tombés dans une embuscade. Presque tous les prévôts ont trouvé la mort... Vous avez devant vous les quelques survivants. »

languages.text: "Ich bin der Aufseher des mittleren Decks AL-84, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Wir versammelten gerade alle aus den angegriffenen Abteilen, die wir finden konnten, als wir in einen Hinterhalt gerieten. Fast alle Enforcers sind gefallen ... Das hier sind die Überlebenden."
languages.original_text: "Overseer of Middle Deck AL-84, my {mf|lord|lady}! We were rounding up everyone we could find in the attacked compartments when we ran into an ambush. Just about every enforcer fell... These are the survivors."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin der Aufseher des mittleren Decks AL-84, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Wir versammelten gerade alle aus den angegriffenen Abteilen, die wir finden konnten, als wir in einen Hinterhalt gerieten. Fast alle Enforcers sind gefallen ... Das hier sind die Überlebenden."

languages.text: "Orta Güverte AL-84 Gözetmeni'yim {mf|lordum|leydim}! Saldırıya uğrayan kompartımanlarda kalan herkesi topluyorduk ki pusuya düştük. Hemen hemen tüm infazcıları kaybettik. Hayatta kalanlar bunlar."
languages.original_text: "Overseer of Middle Deck AL-84, my {mf|lord|lady}! We were rounding up everyone we could find in the attacked compartments when we ran into an ambush. Just about every enforcer fell... These are the survivors."

traits.locale_text: "Orta Güverte AL-84 Gözetmeni'yim {mf|lordum|leydim}! Saldırıya uğrayan kompartımanlarda kalan herkesi topluyorduk ki pusuya düştük. Hemen hemen tüm infazcıları kaybettik. Hayatta kalanlar bunlar."
